item.title: Bus carrying junior high football team crashes near Pittsburgh. 21 people are taken to hospitals
item.description: A bus carrying a junior high football team to a game crashed Saturday north of Pittsburgh, sending 21 of the 28 people on board to the hospital, officials said.

item.title: European postal services suspend shipment of packages to US over import tariffs
item.description: Postal services in Germany, Denmark, Sweden and Italy say they will stop shipping most merchandise to the U.S. effective immediately.

item.title: Students face new cellphone restrictions in 17 states as school year begins
item.description: The movement has gained bipartisan support due to concerns about phones affecting mental health and learning.

item.title: Annabelle Kemper looking to go out on top in senior season with Lady Seminoles
item.description: Annabelle Kemper looking to go out on top in senior season with Lady Seminoles

item.title: State Road 64 construction may slow traffic
item.description: State Road 64 construction may slow traffic

item.title: Homes severely damaged by strong thunderstorms in Palmetto
item.description: Homes severely damaged by strong thunderstorms in Palmetto

item.title: Fire captain accused of fatally shooting partner, her young son
item.description: A fire captain is being held without bond after his partner and her young son were killed in a shooting at his home.

item.title: Mother donates part of her own liver to save 8-year-old daughter’s life
item.description: When an 8-year-old girl diagnosed with a rare and serious liver disease needed a transplant, her mother looked within and found the strength to donate.

item.title: Bradenton Police warn of email scam involving city permit invoices
item.description: Officials say the scammers are impersonating City staff, claiming extra payments are required and demanding wire transfers for permit payments.

item.title: ‘Live life good’ Suncoast resident turns 105; shares her best advice
item.description: Miss Winnie told ABC7 the secret to a long full life is to “Live life good and love your family.”

item.title: State Road 64 construction near I-75 may slow traffic
item.description: Roadwork to close lanes this week on SR-64. Delays possible.

item.title: Weekend rain pattern continues today, but changes are on the way
Child pulled into drainage system in critical condition, reports
item.description: Sarasota County Sheriffs say a child pulled into the drainage system.

item.title: Homes severely damaged by strong thunderstorms in Palmetto
item.description: Storms producing gusts of wind around 50 mph were reported by the NWS.
